Begin Row: k3; insert needle knitwise into the next stitch and wrap yarn 3 times around point of needle; then knit the stitch*
Repeat: k7; insert needle knitwise into the next stitch and wrap yarn 3 times around point of needle; then knit the stitch
Slip 1 wyib, if there are extra wraps, drop the extra wraps from the stitch that is being slipped; k3
insert needle knitwise into the next stitch and wrap yarn 3 times around point of needle; then knit the stitch; k7
Slip 1 wyib, dropping the extra wraps from the stitch that is being slipped; k3
